name: Little Daring Cindrella
description:
Welcome to little daring cindrella - a cool kid game!

Do you think you have the skills with little daring cindrella - a cool kid game?

When Cindrella is a little girl, her father loves her so much and she lives like a princess. One day her father and her are invited to the royal tea party, but she gets messy while playing with her puppy! Hurry up and help her get prepared! First we need to tidy her up. Then choose the most cute outfits perfect for the royal tea party! Have fun!

Game features:

• Simple and easy to use!
• Great Graphics!
• Kids will love it and be entertained for ages!
• Cute and friendly design !
• Awesome Sounds and music!
• Beautiful graphics and characters!
• Catchy sounds and music!
• Easy game-play even for the smallest kids!
